text: You fling the ice jewel into the simmering lava pool. You see the burning red liquid blacken where the jewel falls, and the cooling effect stifles the continuous bubble of sulphurous gas from below. The skiapyrs give vent to anguished shrieks that sound like the keening of someone being burnt alive. They are linked to the lava pit that is their home. By robbing it of heat, the ice jewel is sapping their strength.
